title: Mechanical Parts & Repair
description: An essential piece of workshop machinery was out of commission due to a broken, discontinued plastic gear. We meticulously measured the original part, reverse-engineered it in CAD, and printed a high-strength replacement in durable ABS.

title: Mechanical Parts & Repair
description: An essential piece of workshop machinery was out of commission due to a broken, discontinued plastic gear. We meticulously measured the original part, reverse-engineered it in CAD, and printed a high-strength replacement in durable ABS.

title: Custom Raspberry Pi Enclosure
description: A client needed a custom-fit case for their electronics project. We designed a durable, ventilated enclosure from scratch in CAD, ensuring precise port cutouts and a secure snap-fit lid. Printed in PETG for its heat resistance and strength.
